about

Welcome to my website!

My name is Kyle Adamos, I'm a recent graduate from UCI. I studied mechanical engineering with an emphasis in the design of mechanical systems.

In the last half of my undergraduate studies, I decided to enroll in several management courses such as computational thinking, decision analysis, management science, organizational behavior, and the foundation of teams.
